metadata.unit_designation: Xxi Corpo D Armata Xxi Corps

narrative.title: Xxi Corpo D Armata Xxi Corps - 1941Q2
narrative.situation: Italian Colonial Infantry Corps deployed in North Africa during 1941Q2.
narrative.objectives: Colonial infantry corps responsible for static defense of Cyrenaica region. Primarily defensive posture with limited counterattack capability. Organized to hold extended front with minimal mobile reserves.
narrative.axis_objective: Maintain defensive positions and inflict maximum casualties on Allied forces.
narrative.allied_objective: Advance and secure strategic objectives while minimizing casualties.

weather.terrain: Coastal plain and rocky desert (Cyrenaica region)

air_support.note: No theater air summary available for this quarter

environment.terrain_type: Coastal plain and rocky desert (Cyrenaica region)
